content: On a fiscal year-to-date basis, our operating profit of $1.9 million compares to $201,000 for the first 9 months of 2021. So revenues totaled $6.7 million in Q3 2022 compared to $5.5 million generated in Q3 2021, an increase of 22%. For the first 9 months of 2022, revenues totaled $20.5 million compared with $16.2 million for the 9 months of 2021. For the first 9 months of 2022, gross margin totaled $5.7 million compared to $3.4 million for the first 9 months of 2021. Selling, general and administrative expenses, SG&A, totaled $1.2 million in Q3 2022 and remain steady when compared with SG&A expenses of $1.2 million in Q3 2021. For the first 9 months of 2022, SG&A totaled $3.8 million compared to $3.2 million for the first 9 months of 2021. For the first 9 months of 2022, operating income totaled $1.9 million compared to $201,000 for the first 9 months of '21. Accounts receivable at October 1, 2022, totaled $5.8 million, up from $4.9 million in December -- or at December 25, 2021. Inventories totaled $4.9 million at October 1, 2022, compared to $3.9 million at December 25, 2021. In addition, I'm also glad to share with you that our team successfully qualified several new hermetic packaging products, with a key new Tier 1 customer, resulting in an initial production order valued at $1 million and future initial projections at 2x to 3x that starting in fiscal year '23 and continuing for years. I will say that our recent success in passing first article test and reverting to low rate initial production, with a key aerospace customer in Q3, we are demonstrating our business development and tech team's ability to identify and convert new material solutions.
